0.text: Innate: Each time Jayce switches between  Hammer Stance and  Cannon Stance he gains  40 bonus movement speed and  ghosting for 0.75 seconds.
0.html: Innate: Each time Jayce switches between Hammer Stance and Cannon Stance he gains  40 bonus movement speed and ghosting for 0.75 seconds.

0.text: Active: Jayce  leaps to the target enemy's location and smashes his hammer on the ground upon arrival, dealing physical damage to all enemies within an area and  slowing them for 2 seconds.
0.html: Active: Jayce leaps to the target enemy's location and smashes his hammer on the ground upon arrival, dealing physical damage to all enemies within an area and slowing them for 2 seconds.

1.text: Lightning Field can be cast during the dash.
1.html: Lightning Field can be cast during the dash.

0.text: Passive: Jayce's basic attacks restore  mana  on-hit.
0.html: Passive: Jayce's basic attacks restore  mana on-hit.

1.text: Active: Jayce surrounds himself with an electric field for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage each second to all nearby enemies over the duration.
1.html: Active: Jayce surrounds himself with an electric field for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage each second to all nearby enemies over the duration.

0.text: Active: Jayce swings his hammer at the target enemy, dealing magic damage, capped against  monsters, while also  pulling them to a location 500 units in front of him.
0.html: Active: Jayce swings his hammer at the target enemy, dealing magic damage, capped against monsters, while also pulling them to a location 500 units in front of him.

0.content: 8 / 10.4 / 12.8 / 15.2 / 17.6 / 20% of target's maximum health (+ 100% bonus AD)

0.text: Active: Jayce transforms into  Cannon Stance, receiving access to its abilities, becoming  ranged with  500 attack range, and empowering his next basic attack to reduce the target's  armor and  magic resistance by 10 / 15 / 20 / 25% (based on level) for 5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Jayce transforms into Cannon Stance, receiving access to its abilities, becoming ranged with  500 attack range, and empowering his next basic attack to reduce the target's  armor and  magic resistance by 10 / 15 / 20 / 25% (based on level) for 5 seconds.

1.text: Jayce begins the game with Transform but cannot increase its rank. Instead, his basic abilities each have 6 ranks.
1.html: Jayce begins the game with Transform but cannot increase its rank. Instead, his basic abilities each have 6 ranks.

0.text: Innate: Each time Jayce switches between  Hammer Stance and  Cannon Stance he gains  40 bonus movement speed and  ghosting for 0.75 seconds.
0.html: Innate: Each time Jayce switches between Hammer Stance and Cannon Stance he gains  40 bonus movement speed and ghosting for 0.75 seconds.

0.text: Active: Jayce fires an electric bolt in the target direction that detonates upon hitting an enemy or max range, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies and briefly granting  sight of the area.
0.html: Active: Jayce fires an electric bolt in the target direction that detonates upon hitting an enemy or max range, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies and briefly granting sight of the area.

1.text: If the bolt passes through  Acceleration Gate, it supercharges: dealing 40% increased damage with increased speed, range and explosion radius.
1.html: If the bolt passes through Acceleration Gate, it supercharges: dealing 40% increased damage with increased speed, range and explosion radius.

0.text: Active: Jayce empowers his next 3 basic attacks within 4 seconds to deal modified damage and gain  300% bonus attack speed.Hyper Charge's total damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers.
0.html:
Active: Jayce empowers his next 3 basic attacks within 4 seconds to deal modified damage and gain  300% bonus attack speed.

Hyper Charge's total damage is affected by critical strike modifiers.

1.text: Hyper Charge  resets Jayce's basic attack timer.
1.html: Hyper Charge resets Jayce's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Jayce deploys an energy gate centered at the target location for 4 seconds, granting  sight of its area. Jayce and all allied champions can move through it to gain  bonus movement speed that decays over 3 seconds.
0.html: Active: Jayce deploys an energy gate centered at the target location for 4 seconds, granting sight of its area. Jayce and all allied champions can move through it to gain  bonus movement speed that decays over 3 seconds.

1.text: The buff is continuously refreshed while inside the gate. Acceleration Gate will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
1.html: The buff is continuously refreshed while inside the gate. Acceleration Gate will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Jayce transforms into  Hammer Stance, receiving access to its abilities, becoming  melee with  125 attack range, gaining 5 / 15 / 25 / 35 (based on level)  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance, and empowering his next basic attack to deal 25 / 65 / 105 / 145 (based on level) (+ 25% bonus AD) bonus magic damage.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+55 attack damage
+18 Lethality (11.2 − 18 (based on level) armor penetration)
+7% omnivamp

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ever Rising Moon: Hitting an enemy champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 1.5 seconds deals them ( 6% / 3%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage and grants you 15% bonus movement speed and a shield for ( 160 / 80) (+ ( 35% / 17.5%) bonus AD) for 2 seconds (( 8 / 16) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 4% armor penetration, and 5 bonus movement speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – EVER RISING MOON: Hitting an enemy champion with 2 separate attacks or abilities within 1.5 seconds deals them ( 6% /  3%) of target's maximum health as bonus physical damage and grants you 15% bonus movement speed and a  shield for ( 160 /  80) (+ ( 35% /  17.5%) bonus AD) for 2 seconds (( 8 /  16) second cooldown).

1.originHTML: +  +  +  750

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+35 attack damage
+15 ability haste
+500 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants bonus attack damage equal to 2.5% maximum mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Consumes a charge on-hit and whenever affecting an enemy or ally with an ability to grant 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 for champion targets, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Muramana at +360 mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants bonus attack damage equal to 2.5% maximum mana.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  1050

origin: 8 / 10.4 / 12.8 / 15.2 / 17.6 / 20% of target's maximum health (+ 100% bonus ad)
